entry.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - T06E05
entry.content:
Jul 8, 23:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 08/07/2023 22:10 UTC
End Time : 08/07/2023 22:48 UTC
Root cause : This incident was caused by network equipment issue .
Our technical teams have resolved the problem. All the services concerned are now operational.

Jul 8, 22:43 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/07/2023 22:10 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are currently inaccessible in rack T06E05
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
